page.title: Business Account Bearing Interest
page.tab:
At Hong Leong Bank we understand the need to offer competitive interest rates, and instant access solutions to help manage your business cash flow. Hong Leong Bank helps you to manage the return on your deposits, with attractive rates to match the amount you wish to deposit.

Key Features and Benefits:

  • Two currencies are available in USD and KHR
  • Interest is computed on end of day ledger balance
  • Our Relationship Manager is assigned to assist you to effectively manage your account.

Eligibility:

  • Minimum initial Deposit is USD 5,000 or KHR 20,000,000
  • Minimum Balance requirement is USD 500 or KHR 2,000,000
  • This account is applicable to non-individual

Requirement documents for Company:

  • Identification Documents of the Authorized Signatories and Board of director(s)
  • Certificate of Incorporation
  • Latest Memorandum and Articles of Association
  • Letter of Approval from Ministry of Commerce (MOC)
  • Annual Declaration
  • Latest Patent Certificate
  • Original Board of director(s) and shareholder(s) resolution
  • Other documentation is required depending on the type of institution.
